Subskills.name: Bonemarrow
Subskills.description: Decreases the cooldown of bone barrage.

Subskills.name: Skeletal Stock
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of bone spikes.

Subskills.name: Nova of Bones
Subskills.description: Unleash all the projectiles around you in a circle. Bone barrage no longer has a cooldown.

Subskills.name: Bone Growth
Subskills.description: Increases the size of bone spikes.

Subskills.name: Swift Bone
Subskills.description: Increases the projectile speed of bone spikes.

Subskills.name: Hard as Steel
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by bone spikes.

Subskills.name: Rib Crack
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict stun on hit.

Subskills.name: Explosive Density
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to unleash a bloody explosion dealing additional damage.

Subskills.name: Barraging Boneswirl
Subskills.description: Bone spikes now spiral outwards from you with increased speed.

Subskills.name: Flexible Bonestructure
Subskills.description: Bone spikes bounce from terrain dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Bone Pong
Subskills.description: Chance to chain between multiple monsters on hit dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Skeletal Impact
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to stunned targets.

Subskills.name: Master of Bonelogy
Subskills.description: Bone spikes start homing towards nearest monsters briefly after casting dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Hell on Earth
Subskills.description: Bone spikes now rain from the sky on enemies around you causing the spikes to fragment when hitting the ground launching small fragments around the point of impact.
